title: This patch...
body:
I had no idea that Riot decided to change all my teammates into Wukong. What a nice change.

Also, Kled is so fun but disgustingly broken that it leaves a sour taste in my mouth when I play him.

replies.body: I love him to bits! Level 7 here we come :D
